title: KUCH KHWAAB SAGAR SE
description: EACH POEMS BE IT "MA" OR "MAUT" LEADS YOU TO THE ANSWERS OF LIFE.CHOICE OF WORDS AND THEIR ASSEMBLY IS SUPERBLY DONE AND THE POEMS ARE EASY TO READ.WE CAN RELATE TO THE POEMS QUITE EASILY.SENSE OF ROMANCE IN THE POEM"MERI EK KAHANI THI" IS TRULY HEART WARMING.READ AND RELAX WITH A CUP OF COFFEE IN A SHACK ON BEACH
author: Kunal Narayan Uniyal
